.. _`imeta_ls`:

IMETA_LS
========

Perform iRODS `imeta ls` command





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_iRODS_imeta_ls:
        input:
            # Optional input file
            collection = "collection_list.txt"
        output:
            "metadata.txt"
        params:
            # Optional collection name list
            name = ["/path/to/iRODS/archive/collection.txt"]
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/iRODS/imate_ls"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Use iRODS/imeta qu and iRODS/extract_collections to get a list of collections
Use iRODS/yaml to parse the output file easily

Parameters:

* extra (str): Extra parameters for `imeta ls`
* name (str): A list of collections to look for
